article_title: Brazil Tackles 2016 Budget Amid Divergent Pressures
article_text:
BRASÍLIA—Brazilian lawmakers are on track to vote this week on fiscal targets for 2016 under close scrutiny from investors looking for hints about the nation’s willingness to keep its debt under control.

If lawmakers approve a budget plan forecasting savings to pay down public debt, the so-called “primary surplus,” it would be seen as a sign of...
